page.title: 11FOOD IN 1985
page.content: {This food is popular with children { {CHIPS}these are long slices of potato which we fry in a chip pan. {BEEFBURGERS}these are round and are made with minced beef. {FISHFINGERS}these are long oblongs with fish inside them and yellow bread crumbs on the outside. {BAKED BEANS}these are orange coloured beans with tomato sauce. {SPAGHETTI}this is long worms of flour and water with tomato sauce on top. {PUDDINGS }ice cream is made of frozen milk and cream. Jellies are wobbly and are made with water and gelatine and flavouring. My fauourite flavours are blackcurrant raspberry and orange and strawberry. {By Claire Ball age 8
